title: Random Minting
description: It's a well known fact that many people are capable of exploiting how NFT contracts mint their tokens. This can lead to large distributions of your rarest tokens being minted to a small group of people. The current best solution for this is to randomly decide the token to mint at the time of the mint. This can be done with a randomness oracle or by incurring extra overhead of handling it inside your own contract. We believe the second option is a more robust option across different chains and currently implement the ERC721R standard described here//github.com/erc721r/ERC721R
